UseInformationalNoteInsteadOfTransferFor.description: Allows credit unions to place informational notes (known as memos in Summit) on accounts instead of transferring funds to a holding account for ACH processing.

minVersion.description: The minimum allowed Online Banking version that can use the Use Informational NoteInstead Of Transfer For Ach Transactions feature

enabled.description: Whether the Use Informational NoteInstead Of Transfer For Ach Transactions feature is enabled

informationalNoteRangeMinimum.description: The minimum value in the memo number range used for creating guaranteed funds memos for ACH transactions

informationalNoteRangeMaximum.description: The maximum value in the memo number range used for creating guaranteed funds memos for ACH transactions

noteExpirationTimeInDays.description: The life of the Guaranteed funds note in days

transactionDescription.description: The transaction description for pending outgoing ACH transactions (Guaranteed funds memos/informational notes) that will be displayed to users when viewing account history

byPassNote.description: Whether to bypass creating the informational note
